keywords: FinTech blockchain AI startups funding latest
Agentic AI in finance market entry barriers
Web3 FinTech venture capital trends past 12 months
Funding rounds FinTech AI blockchain Q3 2023 - Q2 2024
strategy: The DeepCrawlerAgent will execute targeted searches focusing on recent developments (last 6-12 months) concerning new companies entering the FinTech sector leveraging blockchain and agentic AI. The strategy involves monitoring venture capital funding announcements, startup accelerators, and industry reports to identify emerging players and their initial market traction. The agent will also investigate regulatory changes or sandbox initiatives that might facilitate or hinder new entry for blockchain and AI-powered financial services. Key data points to extract include funding amounts, investor types, stated value propositions, and any public discussions about market entry challenges or competitive advantages held by incumbents, providing insights into the barriers to entry and the velocity of new firm creation in this specific niche.
